chokepoints.name: Strait of Hormuz
chokepoints.status: IRGC BAN â€” RADIO WARNINGS TO SHIPS
chokepoints.note: IRGC broadcasting radio: "No ship is allowed to pass the Strait of Hormuz." Tankers still transiting last report. 20% global oil/gas at risk.

conflicts.name: Ukraine-Russia War
conflicts.update: Zelenskyy-Trump call Feb 25 re: peace talks. US-Ukraine envoys meeting Geneva Feb 26. Russia recruiting 1,700+ African mercenaries. Frontlines static in Donbas.

conflicts.name: Gaza Conflict
conflicts.update: Modi addressed Israeli Knesset Feb 25. Hostage negotiations ongoing. IDF operations continuing in Gaza.

conflicts.name: Red Sea / Houthi Campaign
conflicts.update: Houthi drone/missile attacks on shipping ongoing. Nimitz CSG in North Arabian Sea. Commercial vessels rerouting via Cape of Good Hope.

conflicts.name: Israel-Lebanon Border
conflicts.update: Ceasefire largely holding since Nov 2024. IDF buffer zone in southern Lebanon maintained. Sporadic incidents only.

conflicts.name: Syria â€” Post-Assad Transition
conflicts.update: HTS-led government consolidating control post-Assad fall. ISIS remnants active in east Syria. Turkey, US, Israel all maintaining presence.

conflicts.name: Taiwan Strait Tensions
conflicts.update: PLA Fujian carrier conducting drills near strait. Philippines People Power 40th anniversary protests. US FON transits maintained.

conflicts.name: South China Sea Disputes
conflicts.update: PLA activity elevated near Spratlys. Philippines-China standoffs at Second Thomas Shoal continuing. Marcos Jr under pressure domestically.

conflicts.name: ðŸ’€ KHAMENEI DEAD â€” OP EPIC FURY CONTINUES
conflicts.update: DAY 2: Strikes continuing. 201 dead, 747 injured. School: 108 killed. Khamenei dead confirmed. No successor. US: zero casualties.

exercises.notes: NATO's largest defensive exercise. Focus on eastern flank.

exercises.notes: Annual Russian strategic exercise. China participation expected.

exercises.name: RED FLAG 26-2
exercises.notes: RED FLAG 26-1 completed Jan 2026. 26-2 planned for spring.

gps_zones.notes: PLA jamming exercises. Intermittent disruption to civil aviation.

gps_zones.notes: ACTIVE. Iran in combat state. Full-spectrum jamming and spoofing expected across Persian Gulf, Strait of Hormuz, and Gulf of Oman. All navigation caution.

notams.notes: UKMTO/US Navy warnings. Commercial vessels avoiding core lanes.

notams.notes: Beirut airport operational. South Lebanon restricted.

notams.notes: BREAKING: Qatar reported Iranian attacks on its territory. Al Udeid AB (largest US base in region, ~10,000 troops) targeted. Qatar: 'successfully countered a number of attacks.' CAOC operations status unknown.

notams.name: ðŸ”´ UAE â€” Missile Attack, 1 KIA
notams.notes: BREAKING: UAE confirmed Iranian missile attack on its territory. 1 killed by falling debris from air defense intercepts. Airspace 'partially and temporarily' closed. Al Dhafra AB (F-22s, tankers) on alert.

notams.name: Sudan Airspace NOTAM

notams.name: Myanmar Conflict Zone

notams.notes: CONFIRMED: Satellite imagery (Vantor) shows burning vessels at pier. Konarak Naval Base, southern Iran. IRGCN fast attack craft base.

ALSO KILLED: IRGC commander, Defense Minister, Security Council secretary
Iran Red Crescent: 201 killed, 747 injured â€” 24 of 31 provinces struck
Girls school Minab: 85 killed (updated from 53) â€” CENTCOM investigating
Konarak Naval Base: burning vessels at pier confirmed by satellite (Vantor/USNI)
200 Israeli jets struck ~500 targets simultaneously
LUCAS one-way attack drone: first combat use confirmed
CVN-72 Abraham Lincoln (N. Arabian Sea) active â€” F-35C + F/A-18 strikes, DDGs fired Tomahawks
New strikes at 22:00 UTC: 3 explosions near Tehran Intelligence Ministry
Israel resuming strikes on central Iran missile launchers + air defense
IRGC claims: US FP-132 radar Qatar destroyed, US combat support vessel struck at sea
Kuwait: 3 soldiers injured, drone struck Kuwait International Airport
UAE: Pakistani civilian killed Abu Dhabi, 4 injured Palm Dubai
Bahrain: 3 residential buildings damaged by drone/debris Manama/Muharraq

US CENTCOM: ZERO casualties, minimal damage, hundreds of Iranian attacks defended
IRGC radio to ships: No vessel allowed through Strait of Hormuz
Trump: bombing continues uninterrupted through the week or longer
Iran near-total internet blackout (NetBlocks confirmed)
IAEA: no evidence of radiological impact
